name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Musical Fusion**

The Footprints Festival 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 11 artists, offering a rich tapestry of global sounds and styles. Spanning genres like electronic, jazz, psychedelic folk, Malian desert blues, and Anatolian rock, this year’s festival celebrates the intersections of tradition and experimentation. With an average rating of 7.73, the carefully curated roster has resonated strongly with audiences, showcasing music that pushes boundaries while honoring cultural roots.

Diversity is at the heart of Footprints 2026, with artists hailing from 10 different countries, including Germany, Iran, Turkey, Nigeria, and Brazil. Impressively, 7 out of the 11 featured acts include people of color, reflecting the festival’s commitment to amplifying underrepresented voices in the music industry. Gender representation is also notable, with both female and mixed-gender groups adding to the festival’s inclusive ethos.

This year’s edition of Footprints highlights the common ground between artists—an emphasis on blending traditional influences with modern sounds. From minimalist electropop to 80s-inspired grooves and Afrobeat rhythms, the festival promises an immersive journey through the global soundscape, making it a vibrant celebration of music’s power to connect cultures and communities.
